org.linqs.psl.reasoner.sgd.term

Class SGDObjectiveTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.sgd.term.SGDObjectiveTerm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReasonerTerm, StreamingTerm

    public class SGDObjectiveTerm
extends Object
implements StreamingTerm
    A term in the objective to be optimized by a SGDReasoner.

        Adjust the term's internal constant by removing the old value and inserting the new value. This is typically because an observed variable's value has changed.
